name: .EBP File Extension
summary: Learn about .EBP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an EBP file (Express Burn Project) and use it to burn files to a disc in Express Burn (Windows, Mac). To do so, open Express Burn and select File â†’ Open Project from the program's menu bar. If you want to view an EBP file's contents outside Express Burn, you can open it in any text editor.
